vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
παραδοξ-άζω,
make wonderful or extraordinary, [LXX]; τὰς πληγάς σου will lay unheard-of inflictions upon thee,[LXX]
__2 π. ἀνὰ μέσον τῶν κτηνῶν put a mark of distinction between, separate,[LXX]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to do an incredible thing; render notorious
vocabInfos.mediumDef: to do an incredible thing; render notorious
